${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:CoreOverdrivePower.NAME: Core Overdrive
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, recover #b Energy.

${modID}:BurnTheStars.NAME: Burneth
DESCRIPTION: At the start and end of your turn, take #b damage, #yBurneth can't kill on turn start.

${modID}:DrawPassiveStartTurn.NAME: Draw Card
DESCRIPTION: At the start and End of your turn, draw #b cards.

${modID}:RetainCostZeroLilStars.NAME: Star Reserve
DESCRIPTION: All Little Stars are Retained. NL On the next turn they cost 0.

${modID}:VengefulPower.NAME: Vengeful Action
DESCRIPTION: If received unblocked damage on the enemy turn, do 1 out-of 3: NL Draw 1~3 Cards next turn. NL Recover 1~3 [E] next turn. NL Recover 5~15 Health.
